title: 820-00165 screen is lagging and faded collors
message:
Hi there,

Have this board, on internal screen the graphics are slow(refresh rate) and all colors are faded out.

What are the chances the issue is with the lcd? Or is it the board issue?

title: 820-00165 screen is lagging and faded collors
message: By the way, the issue present only on the internal screen, on the external monitor everything is working as expected with no issue

title: 820-00165 screen is lagging and faded collors
message:
Bad LCD, most likely...
Low chance to be video cable issue.

title: 820-00165 screen is lagging and faded collors
message: Any chances its the board? Unfortunatly dont have any spare lcd to test it, will have to order one

title: 820-00165 screen is lagging and faded collors
message:
I don't think.
Get known good LCD assembly for test.

title: 820-00165 screen is lagging and faded collors
